channel.title: Castle Court Improv
channel.description: Q: Is there a JESTER in the house? A: There's certainly more than one in this comedy improvisation podcast based on listener suggestions by CASTLE COURT IMPROV from New Castle, PA, USA. (It's true, they named a whole city after us!).
channel.itunes:subtitle: Is There A Jester In The House?
channel.itunes:author: Castle Court Improv
channel.itunes:summary: Q: Is there a JESTER in the house? A: There's certainly more than one in this comedy improvisation podcast based on listener suggestions by CASTLE COURT IMPROV from New Castle, PA, USA. (It's true, they named a whole city after us!).

item.title: Special Report
item.description: Our own Jack Sanner interviews resident George W Bush concerning his love of good comedy and his overwhelming interest in Castle Court Improv.
item.dc:creator: Castle Court Improv
item.itunes:summary: Our own Jack Sanner interviews resident George W Bush concerning his love of good comedy and his overwhelming interest in Castle Court Improv.
